fulltext:
CURRICULUM VITAE 
PERSONAL INFORMATION 
                                        Name:   
Nguyen Minh Quan 
Date of birth:    
04/06/1989 
Gender:   
Male 
Marital status:   
Single 
PERSONAL  CHARACTERISTICS 
I have experience to be responsible for Category Manager in e-commercial industry. 
- Involve making business plan, category strategy. 
- In charge of brands, take care of brand development. 
- Strong experience in communicate & maintain relationship with brands. 
- I am always expected to learn and get more experience, work under pressure and good at problems 
solving.  
Salary Required: $1700 (not included commission). 
EXPERIENCES 
Corèle V.  
Group Corèle International 
From: October 2018 To: Present 
Viettel Building, Tower 2, Floor 13rd 
285 CMT8 Street, Ward 12, District 
10, HCMC, Vietnam 
Position: Brand Manager – Marguerite 
Responsibilities: 
- Build quarterly and yearly marketing plan and strategy. 
- Set up brand positioning, follow and keep the position via 
activities concept. 
- Analyze market situation, consumer trend. 
- Collect and analyze competitors’ brand and sales 
performance. 
- Understand market feedback about the brand or activities. 
- Set up objectives. 
- Make yearly plan and plan for each campaign. 
- Control marketing budget spending as plan. 
- Estimate monthly sales and expenditure, cost control for 
each campaign. 
- Check the daily/weekly sale. 
- Understand sales performance of the brand. 
- Make monthly promotion plan. 
- Coordinate with sales team in sales related activities. 
(including GT/MT/RT/OL) 
Page 1 of 4 
- Develop a quarter/yearly communication plan. 
- Contact suppliers and other relevant jobs. 
Shopee Vietnam 
Position: Senior Relationship Manager 
– Men Apparels 
From: September 2017 To: October 
2018 
Level 17, Saigon Center – Tower 2, 67 
Le Loi Street, Ben Nghe Ward, 
District 1, HCMC, Vietnam 
Responsibilities: 
- Define, implement and execute the business development / 
growth strategy for the category. 
- Hire, train and manage a team of Sales and Key Account 
Managers to help grow and manage your portfolio of 
merchants.  
- Management sales and key account team. Capacity team: 9. 
- Developing online merchandising and promotion proposals 
to achieve sales targets. 
- Retain and optimize key account relationships to drive 
overall sales volumes. Ensuring pricing competitiveness, 
assortment, stock availability of key merchants within the 
category. 
- Carry out analysis & survey to better understand merchant 
requirements and behavior. 
- Identify, establish and grow other local strategic 
partnerships. 
Lazada Vietnam 
Position: Senior Key Account Manager 
& Buyer 
From: August 2016 To: Sep 2017 
Level 19, Saigon Center – Tower 2, 67 
Le Loi Street, Ben Nghe Ward, 
District 1, HCMC, Vietnam 
Responsibilities: 
- Establish strong relations with sellers and support their 
performance, as their main contact point.  
- Be in charge of the assortment development of fashion 
category products for Lazada, specially in watch – sunglasses 
– jewelry. 
- Identify key assortment opportunities, build sales team 
priority plan to assist for execution.  
- Support product and content creation process to increase 
assortment live.  
- Plan and maintain constant stock availability.  
- Ensure ambitious revenue growth.  
- Coach sellers on competitive pricing.  
- Suggest promotions to sellers, sell marketing services, 
organize these campaigns internally.  
- Build weekly marketing plan, contribute determining which 
products/ subcategories will be promoted on website and 
through all marketing channels (Newsletters, Facebook, 
Display…etc).  
- Develop strong analytics to evaluate daily/ weekly/ monthly 
performance and optimize further marketing, pricing and 
product selection. 
Page 2 of 4 
- Work closely to Brands to build weekly marketing plan, 
contribute determining which products/subcategories will be 
promoted on website by seasons and marketing channels. 
- Selecting new products and reviewing the old season. 
- Finding the right suppliers. 
- Negotiating prices. 
- Maintaining relationships with existing suppliers while 
seeking new ones. 
Naris Cosmetic 
Position: Regional Sales Manager – 
South & Mekong Delta 
From: February 2015 To: August 2016 
170 – 172 Bui Thi Xuan Street, 5th fl 
Norch Building, HCMC, Vietnam 
Responsibilities: 
- Managing the sales team to achieve sales targets, establishes 
sales objectives by forecasting and developing annual sales 
quotas for regions. (08 stores and 20 sales staffs) 
- Proposal sales plan per month and quarter. 
- Maintains sales volume with creative promotion campaigns. 
- Merchandising. 
- Proposal & recommendation SKU items to set up new 
stores. 
- Planning & tracking set up new stores. 
- Training & coaching sales team. 
- Planning to reach the sales targets. 
- Control and supervision the revenue, P&L. 
- Inventory management. 
- Maintains sales staff by recruiting, selecting, orienting, and 
training employees. 
- Motivations sales team. 
- Responsible for tracking customer information, forecasts 
and reports. 
- Management key account online. 
- Establishing, maintaining and expanding our customer base. 
- Collecting customer feedback and market research. 
DAFC 
Position: Senior Store Manager - 
Assistant Operations Manager 
From: September 2012 To: January 2015 
Centec Tower, HCMC, Viet Nam 
Brands in charged: Versace, Bally 
PANDORA VIETNAM 
Position: Administrator 
From: April 2011 To: September 2012 
Diamond & Parkson Plaza, HCMC, Viet Nam. 
EDUCATION 
University 
Degree 
Graduation year 
The Institute Of Asian Studies 
Marketing 
2014 
FPT University – Greenwich 
University 
Business Management 
2012 – 2013 
Page 3 of 4 
Ho Chi Minh City University Of 
Industry 
Diploma of Petro Chemistry 
2007 – 2010 
SKILLS / KNOWLEDGE 
Basic Accounting. 
Advanced Microsoft Office (Word, Excel, Power Point). 
Internet and Data research. 
I have proactive attitudes and positive work ethics. Hence, I am able to work effectively and 
efficiently with teams or as an individual without supervision.  
I am friendly and easy to make friend with. Therefore, I can develop my social networks easily to 
help achieve business goals.  
I have customer complaints handling skills. This helps every company to proliferate its client data 
base.  
I have time management skills. Therefore, I believe I am able to complete assigned jobs under high 
pressure.  
I am eager to learn as well as having a ‘CAN DO’ attitude. There is no doubt that experience is 
important. However, I believe that adaptability to new circumstances and new technologies is also 
essential. Therefore, I presume that hard-working with enthusiasm and flexibility will assist me in 
fulfilling various business tasks.  
INTERESTED 
Fashion, travel, meeting with new friends and people, learning English, cooking and gym. 
Part time photo modeling. 
REFERENCE 
Name  Title  Contact 
Ms. Ha Nguyen 
Country Manager 
Pandora 
Mobile: 0938.200.880 
Page 4 of 4

educations.school: Ho Chi Minh City University Of Industry
